description: A traditional savoury stuffing, which pairs perfectly with poultry.
keywords: Stuffing,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Thyme & Onion Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Melt the butter a pan with the chopped onions and garlic and fry for 5 minutes until the butter has melted fully and the onions are clear in colour.
Mix together the breadcrumbs and herbs in a separate bowl with the seasoning and then combine the melted butter mix incrementally.
Ensure the total mixture is combined fully and transfer to a baking dish to be baked for 20 minutes and then remove form the heat.
